thread.title: Deepika Padukone to walk the red carpet at Oscars 2017? | Zee News
thread.title_full: Deepika Padukone to walk the red carpet at Oscars 2017? | Zee News

title: Deepika Padukone to walk the red carpet at Oscars 2017? | Zee News
text:
Deepika Padukone to walk the red carpet at Oscars 2017? By Zee Media Bureau | Last Updated: Thursday, February 23, 2017 - 13:23 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: The tall and talented diva Deepika Padukone is leaving no stone unturned in making herself a global icon. On one hand, she has been making waves about her maiden Hollywood film 'xXx: Return of Xander Cage' opposite Vin Diesel and now comes in the latest goss about her attending the academy awards. MUST READ Deepika Padukone's Hollywood debut 'xXx: Return of Xander Cage' mints over $300 mn worldwide! 
Yes! According to Pinkvilla.com, Deepika will soon be letting her hair down in LA for the success party of 'xXx: Return of Xander Cage'. Her stylist Elizabeth Saltzman on Instagram expressed her excitement over meeting the Indian beauty. She posted: 
However, what dropped the big Oscar bomb was Elizabeth's Instagram story which clearly hints that we might actually see Dippy attending the Academy Awards 2017. What fun it would be to see both Deepika and Priyanka Chopra walk the Oscars red carpet! 
Meanwhile, 'xXx: Return of Xander Cage' has minted $308 million and still counting global cumulative figures. Also, it is said to have become the 2017's highest global grosser so far, reportedly. First Published: Thursday, February 23, 2017 - 13:23 More from zeenews
